snippet: The Congressional Research Service withdrew a report that found no correlation between top tax rates and economic growth after senators raised concerns.
abstract: Congressional Research Service withdraws economic report that found no correlation between top tax rates and economic growth, central tenet of conservative economic theory, after Senate Republicans raise concerns about paper's findings and wording.
lead_paragraph: The Congressional Research Service withdrew a report that found no correlation between top tax rates and economic growth after senators raised concerns.

headline.seo: Withdrawal of a Congressional Research Report on Tax Rates Raises Questions
headline.main: Nonpartisan Tax Report Withdrawn After G.O.P. Protest
headline.print_headline: Tax Report Withdrawn At Request Of G.O.P.
